Comment: And the base of maga (unlike the OG Republican Party) are poor folks, folks with bad job prospects, folks on fixed incomes, folks that can’t afford groceries or medical care…  They are people that were already suffering a great deal in this economy.  New tax burdens being placed on their shoulders in the form of tarrifs (everything at Walmart and Dollar General will be way more expensive than it used to be). Inflationary activity by the Trump administration weakening their already limited dollars and their buying power. Grocery prices only going up from here on out…  They’re just going to get utterly destroyed by this administration.   They are going to go from “struggling” in this economy to outright despair, bankruptcy, joblessness, hunger and even homelessness.   That is what is headed for them. And they are the maga base.   If they place the blame on their god king? We can move on and get our country back.  If they believe the god king’s lies that he will no doubt spew at them to save himself - that it is their neighbor’s fault? Then there will be blood.
